Oh no, it’s Caroline!

Everything should

be fine if you just

put them away

where she won’t

see them.

Sister!

I can’t believe you

caught live moths to

bring back as specimens!

It wasn’t me, he’s the one who went to Wales to collect…

Huh! He was

just right here.
Where did he

run off to?

Charles, you traitor!

So you think

you can cowardly blame it on your littlebrother,

eh?

24
